text: Jean Andeka (born in Gombe) is a politician in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and was a candidate in the 2011 presidential election.http://www.lareference.cd/2011/09/the-attorney-jean-marie-andeka.html Candidate Profile He is a practicing lawyer in Gombe,http://www.barreaudelagombe.cd/index.php/annuaire-des- avocats-3?pid=44&sid;=593:ANDEKA-DJAMBA-Jean BdlG graduated from the University of Kinshasa, and was the first candidate to file for election.http://www.rfi.fr/afrique/20111122-rdc-portraits-candidats- presidentielle-Kabila-Tshisekedi-Kamerhe-Mobutu-Wadondo-Nyamwisi-Kashala- Mukendi-Kakese Portrait of Candidate ==References== ==Sources== *Jean Andeka Category:Living people Category:People from Gombe State Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo politicians Category:Candidates for President of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Jean Andeka
